saying: If you can't beat 'em, work harder.
description: Rod is a jock, mouse villager in the Animal Crossing series, debuting in Doubutsu no Mori e+ as one of the six villagers packaged with the game via e-Reader cards, alongside Walker, Maggie, Angus, Merry, and Willow. His name comes from "rodent," the biological order in which mice fall. Rod's initial phrase, "ace," means "to succeed easily" and "highest quality," relating to the competitive nature of jock villagers. It was also Ace's catchphrase.
